name: Pogostick Parkour
description:
Game is best played with controller, although it also has keyboard support! 

Webgl is supported but we recommend playing the downloaded version.

Controls Reminder -

Keyboard:

WASD - Tilt

P - Load to previous checkpoint

R - Load shop

Esc - Quit

Space bar - Jump

Controller:

Left stick - Tilt

Y / Triangle - Load to previous checkpoint

Start/Options - Shop

Select/Back - Quit

RT/R2/A/X - Jump




Credits:
Music:

"Our Story Begins" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
